BattleShip

Destroy All Enemy's Ship to be Winner

Players

  • Player
  • Computer

Goal

Sink all of your opponents ship

SetUp

Each Ship will be Randomly Placed

Rules

  • Each have one chance alternatively given
  • If a Ship is hit the grid will be Red Color
  • Missed Means it will be Green Color
  • If a Ship is Sunk it will be displayed
  • If all ship sunk the game Ends
